messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Migration Alert

Due to Ragnarok, a pack of mice have swarmed into the maintenance tunnels.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Pyroclastic anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Security Post - Medbay.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Migration Alert

Due to bad luck, a whoop of mice have descended into the maintenance areas.
